meanings.sent1: The emus in the zoo are very tall birds.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of emus running across the field.
meanings.sent3: Why did the emus throw a party? Because they wanted to celebrate being emus!
meanings.sent4: The emus stood proudly, like kings of the savannah.
meanings.sent5: The emus' feathers were as soft as a cloud.

meanings.definition: Emus: a large flightless bird native to Australia
meanings.sent1: Emus have strong legs for running fast.
meanings.sent2: The emus' feathers are brown and fluffy.
meanings.sent3: The emus decided to have a race to see who was the fastest bird on the farm.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the emus looked like shadows against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The emus' call echoed through the outback, a haunting melody.
